name: Landing (CrazyStep)
description:
Conquer gravity and land a rocket on the platform. And over and over again. But conditions will change, and the path is not always clear.

You just need to fly around the location from one platform to another, but can you, when everything around you wants to break you.

The game is not over yet and the current version does not have all levels. But all the important functions are implemented and only additional ones are missing, which do not greatly affect the perception of the game
